reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick Moisturizer -Perfect for fall skin!
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the opportunity to try out the ANUA Heartleaf 70 Intense Calming Cream with Ceramide, and I must say it has been a pleasant addition to my skincare routine. As someone with sensitive skin that often becomes red and irritated, I'm always on the lookout for products that can provide soothing relief without causing further issues. This cream certainly is the best I have tried so far!The standout feature of this product is its main ingredient: Heartleaf (Houttuynia Cordata) extract. Heartleaf has been renowned for its calming and anti-inflammatory properties, making it an excellent choice for those with sensitive and easily irritated skin. The cream contains an impressive 70% Heartleaf extract, making it a potent solution for skin woes.Texture and Application:The ANUA Heartleaf 70 Intense Calming Cream has a lightweight, gel-like texture that spreads easily across the skin. It absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy or sticky residue, which is a significant plus for me, especially when used during the daytime. This cream is suitable for all skin types, including oily skin, as it doesn't clog pores or exacerbate oiliness.Soothing and Calming Effect:I found this cream to be incredibly soothing. It visibly reduced redness and irritation, especially after exposure to environmental stressors. The ceramide content in the cream helps to strengthen the skin barrier, resulting in improved moisture retention. This can be particularly beneficial for those with dry or dehydrated skin.Fragrance and Ingredients:One notable aspect of the ANUA Heartleaf 70 Intense Calming Cream is that it's fragrance-free. This is a significant advantage for individuals with sensitive skin, as fragrances can sometimes trigger adverse reactions. The product is also free from harmful chemicals, such as parabens, mineral oil, and artificial colorants, which adds to its appeal for those who prioritize clean beauty.Packaging:The cream comes in a simple yet convenient tube with a screw-on cap, making it easy to dispense the right amount of product without any waste. The packaging is also compact and travel-friendly.Price:This cream is quite an affordable option on the market, a little goes a long way, and the quality justifies the price. Given its effectiveness in calming and hydrating the skin, I consider it a worthy investment for those with sensitive skin concerns.In conclusion, the ANUA Heartleaf 70 Intense Calming Cream with Ceramide is a fantastic addition to any skincare routine, especially for those with sensitive, redness-prone, or easily irritated skin. Its high Heartleaf extract content, soothing properties, and clean formula make it a reliable choice for achieving a calmer, healthier complexion. If you're looking for a solution to address redness and irritation, this cream is definitely worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavenly Moisture for Glowing Skin
reviews.reviewText: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐This Korean moisturizer has become an essential part of my skincare routine, and I can't rave about it enough. The texture is luxurious, smooth, and delightfully thick, providing my skin with the perfect level of hydration. It leaves my skin feeling incredibly soft and nourished. I've recommended it to all my friends and family, and they love it just as much. Truly a standout product that elevates the skincare experience. A must-have for anyone seeking radiant, hydrated skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome dry skin moisturizer!
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizer is great. It’s thick and you only need a little for your face. It really soothed my irritated, dry winter skin. This is just as good as the $50+ moisturizers I’ve gotten from places like Sephora. I bought this on a whim and I’m glad that I did!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love using this with tretinoin! Just a lil expensive
reviews.reviewText: I needed a good cream to use at night after applying tret. Here are the things I like about this cream:- fast absorbing- pleasant smell (but fragrance-free)- makes skin feel super soft!- did not make me breakout (I have acne prone skin)- perfect moisture! (tret dries out my skin that's naturally combo)Just wish it wasn't almost 30 bucks, so I'm docking one star because there may be creams that do a similar job for less. It's not a miracle product but pretty good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best moisturizer ever!
reviews.reviewText: i loved everything from this brand! this in particular had become my favorite, it made my skin soft like nothing ever did! i have very dry sensitive skin and this made it look dewy and healthy and soft! i am amazed and i will be repurchasing it every time i run out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I get a lot of ingrown hairs and razor bumps after I shave. It's to the point where I have to have a pretty set routine especially on shaving days.Thankfully, this moisturizer greatly reduces the irritation and redness that I experience and I have seen noticeable differences in my complexion.Perfect for cold dry days as well and serves as a really good all ay moisturizer.5/5

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing and not greasy
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this face cream! I really struggled to find a good one and took a chance on this one. At first I thought it might be too heavy, but once you put it on, your skin soaks it right up! No greasy residue. Love the smell. I ended up liking it so much, I bought three other Anua products - pore cleansing oil, toner, and the vitamin c serum. Each product is amazing - and for the first time I have been able to create and stick to a full face cleansing routine morning and night! After three weeks of using, I’ve noticed clearer, brighter skin. Plus, a self-care regiment that I literally look forward to when I first wake up and right before bed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: moisturizes my skin and gives it a glow

J’adore la texture de cette crème. Elle pénètre super bien et ne laisse pas la peau grasse. J’ai une peau mixte à grasse et fait très bien pour mon type de peau. Elle n’est pas très odorante même je dirais qu’elle ne sens rien. Elle laisse ma peau hydraté, vraiment douce et lisse.
Prodotto arrivato come previsto. La crema è molto idratante e basta una piccola quantitá. Buon prodotto

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product itself was in very sleek packaging and I was a little skeptical about if it was the real deal but I was proved wrong. Very smooth product and absorbed into my skin leaving it feeling very soft. The delivery was always quick as always too, which was a bonus.
Overall it's good for winter but the cream is a little bit thick for summer especially for those who have oily skin. I love it.
